coreAttributes.name: God-Emperor's sword
coreAttributes.description: A blade made with ancient techniques, now lost to the mysteries of time. This blade is the single most powerful blade made in the history of humanity, rightly so as this was the God-Emperor's.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Slash at [npc2.name] with your Divine sword.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of the allmighty blade. For the Emperor!

hitDescriptions.hitText: Gripping the blade with [npc.namePos] strength, [npc.name] [npc.verb(strike)] at [npc2.name], the flames of the blade pierces [npc2.herHim] with allmighty wrath.
Gripping the sword tightly, [npc.name] [npc.verb(slice)] [npc2.name] with powerful waves of psychic power.
Gazing upon [npc2.name], [npc.name] [npc.verb(take)] the sword with both hands and [npc.verb(strike)] down [npc2.name]!

missDescriptions.missText: Gripping the blade with [npc.namePos] strength, [npc.name] [npc.verb(strike)] at [npc2.name], the flames of the blade pierces [npc2.herHim] with allmighty wrath. [npc2.Name] [npc.verb(dodge)] the blade but barely.
Gripping the sword tightly, [npc.name] [npc.verb(slice)] [npc2.name] with powerful waves of psychic power. Giving [npc2.herHim] a chance to avoid the destructive powers.
Gazing upon [npc2.name], [npc.name] [npc.verb(take)] the sword with both hands and [npc.verb(strike)] down [npc2.name]! This pride however, was enough to give [npc2.Name] a chance to escape death.
